page.title: 10INFANT SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: There are arched windows.We cannot see out of the windows because they are too high up.The bricks have patterns like stairs.There is a{bell tower.}In the hall a place where the bell rope used to hang down. On the front of the school the writing says {Council School.}On the drain pipe says {1906.}There are 3 new bits-the kitchen,toilets and 3 classrooms.The Hall is high and long.Some classrooms have doors going into the Hall.In the classrooms children sit at tables on chairs in groups.We've a {Wendy House} sand,water,toys,maths things,books and jigsaws.We are quiet on the carpet. There is a messy corner with {paints,brushes and a sink.}We all have trays to keep our things in. All the people who work in the school work together.School is a sharing, caring place.
